EmbeddedAssets

Basically, a static library of embedded asset references.  You can target things in this class to grab class type references and instantiate new versions of the assets; f.ex var thing:* = new EmbeddedAssets.Icon_Missing(); The include path is relative to the location of the file defining the embeds.  I’m trying to keep everything under <PROJECT_FOLDER>/assets/*, so we gots to walk back from the location of the AS source to get there.

Author

Gedan
